translations: n.恃强凌弱者，横行霸道者；<非正式>腌牛肉

phrs.translation: [口语]妙极了，好极了(用来表示嘲笑、羡慕等)

sentences.sentence: I fell victim to the office bully.
sentences.translation: 我成了这个办公室霸王欺负的对象。

sentences.sentence: I wasn't going to let him bully me.
He could alternately bully and charm people.
sentences.translation: 他能时而欺负人，时而吸引人。
